title: Shawl, 19th–20th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: block-printed on plain weave, hand-painted details
description: Shawl in fine white cotton printed in polychrome and what appears to be hand painted additions.  Border design is a rural scene along a river; corners feature a rustic bridge, shepherdess and boy on bridge. In center, small bouquets printed in regular intervals form a square. Selvages present.

tombstone.epitaph:
Shawl, 19th–20th century.
19th–20th century. Medium: cotton
Technique: block-printed on plain weave, hand-painted details. Gift of Frances Morris. 1951-111-3.
